name: BluSmart
description:
BluSmart is India's first and leading all-electric ride-hailing mobility service. We are here for a reason. We are on a mission to steer urban India towards a sustainable means of transportation and to provide them efficient, affordable, intelligent, safe and reliable mobility. 

With sustainability being at the core of our operations, our vision is to help transform the Indian cities by building a holistic and comprehensive electric on-demand mobility platform.
slogan:
On-Demand. All Electric. Intelligent. Shared. Smart Mobility.
On LinkedIn’s top Startups list for 2021, 2022 & 2023.
